# CMDx

> Build business logic that's powerful, predictable, and maintainable.

CMDx is a Ruby framework for building maintainable, observable business logic through composable command/service objects. It brings structure, consistency, and powerful developer tools to your business processes.

## Getting Started

- [Home](https://drexed.github.io/cmdx/index.md)
- [Getting Started](https://drexed.github.io/cmdx/getting_started/index.md)

- [Setup](https://drexed.github.io/cmdx/basics/setup/index.md)

- [Chain](https://drexed.github.io/cmdx/basics/chain/index.md)
